title: Language Decision Worksheet
description: Documents the strategic decision about language creation: whether to ignore it, make up phrases ad-hoc, create a naming language, hire a professional, or build a full conlang. Language creation is optional and has diminishing returns for most worldbuilders.

medium.description: Primary medium (audio/visual media benefit most from conlangs; print least)

world_usage_frequency.description: How often this world will be used (one story, series, career)

budget.description: Budget available for language creation ($100-$800 for LCS services)

resources_consulted.description: Books or resources consulted on language creation

x-cross-references.naming-language-brief: If hiring, use the Naming Language Brief
